column1: Smoque BBQ////One of my besties recommended this place to me. She actually tries to go here as many times as possible in a week
column2: so I knew something was up. I was wow'd. The barbecue brisket was so tender
column3: the pulled pork sandwiches were super moist
column4: and the mac n cheese??! That totally sealed the deal for me. I didn't run into a long line when I went so I was pretty lucky. I hear the lines get really long!
